question: Which country's honorary citizenship has been received by Nobel Peace laureate Malala Yousafzai?
explanation: Nobel Peace laureate Malala Yousafzai has become only the 6th person to receive honorary Canadian citizenship for advocating girls\' education.  The Pakistani activist was welcomed to the seat of Canada\'s democracy by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. At age 19, Yousafzai is the youngest person to speak to Canadian members of parliament and senators in a joint session. She is also the youngest to receive honorary Canadian citizenship -- a privilege previously granted to five others including Nelson Mandela, the Dalai Lama and Myanmar\'s Aung San Suu Kyi.
